column1:
GPT-4 More capable than any GPT-3.5 model, able to do more complex tasks, and optimized for chat. Availability depends on your pricing plan. For many basic tasks, the difference between GPT-4 and GPT-3.5 models is not significant.
GPT-3.5 turbo (recommended) - Most capable GPT-3.5 model and optimized for chat at 1/10th the cost of text-davinci-003. Will be updated with our latest model iteration 2 weeks after it is released.
column2:
GPT-4 More capable than any GPT-3.5 model, able to do more complex tasks, and optimized for chat. Availability depends on your pricing plan. For many basic tasks, the difference between GPT-4 and GPT-3.5 models is not significant.
GPT-3.5 turbo (recommended) - Most capable GPT-3.5 model and optimized for chat at 1/10th the cost of text-davinci-003. Will be updated with our latest model iteration 2 weeks after it is released.

column1: By OpenAI docs: What sampling temperature to use, between 0 and 2. Higher values like 0.8 will make the output more random, while lower values like 0.2 will make it more focused and deterministic.
